title: URN Namespace for the Defence Geospatial Information Working Group (DGIWG)
abstract:
This document describes the Namespace Identifier (NID) for Uniform
Resource Name (URN) Namespace resources published by the Defence
Geospatial Information Working Group (DGIWG).  The DGIWG defines
and manages resources that utilize this URN name model.

Management activities for these and other resource types are provided
by the DGIWG Registry System (DRS).  This document is not an Internet 
Standards Track specification; it is published for informational purposes.
